channel.title: I keep getting an error wile trying to run my server
channel.description:
I am sorta new to the server making thing but every time i run it i come up with this _______________________________________________________ 'java' is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file. Press any key to continue . . . _______________________________________________________
I Have the cache in my c: drive. Can somone please help me out here :)

item.title: I keep getting an error wile trying to run my server
item.dc:creator: @Azrimalos Azrimalos
item.description:
@Azrimalos wrote:

Yeah thats what my problem was,
Now i seem to be getting this from my client… It says its connecting in the source command screen, but then i get this error message, it just stays on connecting to update and then this pops up:

And are you the one who made the source Drowning508?

Read full topic
item.source: I keep getting an error wile trying to run my server

item.title: I keep getting an error wile trying to run my server
item.dc:creator: @DuhPk DuhPk
item.description:
@DuhPk wrote:

[quote=“Azrimalos, post:20, topic:363091”]I found the problem, thanks for hte help, i didnt have the things set like you said.
I guess my computer has two folders for programfiles and the java was in the one it wasnt suppose to be in but thats were it downloads anything i download from the internet.

Thanks you all for the help!

*darn new computer pisses me off sometimes! Had server working fine on old computer[/quote]

64 bit operating systems have both ‘Program Files’ and ‘Program Files (x86)’

Read full topic
item.source: I keep getting an error wile trying to run my server

item.title: I keep getting an error wile trying to run my server
item.dc:creator: @Azrimalos Azrimalos
item.description:
@Azrimalos wrote:

I found the problem, thanks for hte help, i didnt have the things set like you said.
I guess my computer has two folders for programfiles and the java was in the one it wasnt suppose to be in but thats were it downloads anything i download from the internet.

Thanks you all for the help!

*darn new computer pisses me off sometimes! Had server working fine on old computer

Read full topic
item.source: I keep getting an error wile trying to run my server

item.title: I keep getting an error wile trying to run my server
item.dc:creator: @DuhPk DuhPk
item.description:
@DuhPk wrote:

[quote=“Azrimalos, post:18, topic:363091”][quote author=DuhPk link=topic=459358.msg3361542#msg3361542 date=1286415398]

[quote author=Azrimalos link=topic=459358.msg3361216#msg3361216 date=1286399277]
Alright i did what it said with the link you posted and still shows

Now starting Server… Please wait…

The system cannot find the path specified.
Press any key to continue . . .

[/quote]Then you didn’t do it right.
[/quote]I have Classpath value CLASSPATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_21\bin;%CLASSPATH%;
and i have path value as C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_21\bin;
I copy and pasted them to this. Did as the directions said to do.[/quote]
Make sure
“jdk1.6.0_21”
is your actual java version…

Read full topic

title Source 474

exit
